Title: Relates to voting by mail and early voting
Summary: Amends early voting provisions; provides that an application for an absentee ballot that does not provide a reason that the applicant is entitled to such a ballot shall be processed as an application for an early mail ballot.
LawCode: Amd El L, generally; amd §§2018-a, 2018-b, 2018-e & 2018-f, Ed L; amd §§84-a & 84-b, Town L
